definitions: a scene in a movie, novel, etc., set in a time earlier than the main story

examples.text: in a series of flashbacks, we follow the pair through their teenage years
the movie tells the story in flashback

shortDefinitions: scene in film, novel, etc. set in time earlier than main story

definitions: a disturbing sudden vivid memory of an event in the past, typically as the result of psychological trauma or taking LSD.
shortDefinitions: disturbing sudden vivid memory of event in past

definitions: a flame moving rapidly back through a combustible vapour

examples.text: cooling the area prevented a flashback

shortDefinitions: flame moving rapidly back through combustible vapour

definitions: move to a scene in a movie, novel, etc. that is set in a time earlier than the main story

examples.text: we flashbacked to a pivotal, defining moment in his life

shortDefinitions: move to scene in film, etc. that is set in time earlier than main story

definitions: experience a sudden vivid memory of an event in the past

examples.text: I flashbacked to the night we arrived here several years ago
my brain was constantly flashbacking to the beginning of the tour

shortDefinitions: experience sudden vivid memory of event in past
